## IProject.sheet() method

Creates a Sheet under the project

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
sheet(sheetId: string, instanceId?: string): ISheet;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  sheetId | string | Sheets are identified by their <code>sheetId</code>, which must be a string longer than 3 characters |
|  instanceId | string | Optionally provide an <code>instanceId</code> if you want to create multiple instances of the same Sheet |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ISheet](./core.isheet.md)

The newly created Sheet

\*\*Docs: https://docs.theatrejs.com/in-depth/\#sheets\*\*
